basic_information.scholarship_name: The Post-Tension Services Endowed Scholarship in Finance

description: Alum Matthew Barlow created The Post Tension Services Endowed Scholarship in Finance to reward a student who works and attends school full-time, much like he did. Eligibility Requirements Undergraduate student Must be enrolled full-time Preference given to a Finance Major with a Real Estate minor Must provide a statement describing if they work outside of attending class

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

criteria.description: SIS_College is Business Administration   or SIS_College_2 is Business Administration
criteria.raw_text: SIS_College is Business Administration   or SIS_College_2 is Business Administration
